column1: After  trial,  the  learned  District  Judge  on  28-10-2019  dismissed  the  said
partition  action.  Being  aggrieved  by  the  said  judgment  the  Petitioners  have
preferred an appeal to the Civil Appellate High Court of the Southern Province
(Galle) which is pending. The Petitioners averred that during the pendency of
the said partition action, the aforesaid Gazzete,  marked P11 was issued by
the 3rd Respondent, declaring that the land in dispute  is a Sacred Land. In
this scenario, the Petitioners averred that they are the sole owners of the land
in sute, and therefore, declaring the same as Sacred Land by P11 is illegal,
